## Source: amazon-inspector (6adc38777e8d247da805a1d508c3d27067be2a85dc25149b0d18453a67dcc18a)
The package typedoc-plugin-fuel-variants was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (30133252253ebd481894afe78505b8ed45be4e61fe6d467afa3e1257b1c5f970)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'typedoc-plugin-fuel-variants' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
